name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee
display_help: Dark Melee allows you to focus the powers of the Netherworld to defeat your foes. The draining effects of most of these powers can reduce the target's Accuracy.

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee.Shadow_Punch
powers.display_help: The dark power of the Netherworld allows you to tap the essence of your foe's soul and transfer it to yourself. This will drain the Hit Points of your enemy and add to your Endurance. The more Endurance you have, the more damage this power will inflict. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Fast

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee.Smite
powers.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals more damage than Shadow Punch, but has a longer recharge time. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee.Shadow_Maul
powers.display_help: You wrap your entire arms with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a series of blows that deal a lot of damage over a short period of time to multiple targets in front of you. These blows cloud your target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 7 ft. radius 120° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 4 ticks of 8.44 smashing damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 8.44 negative energy damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 13.45 smashing damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 13.45 negative energy damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 7.59 fire damage over 2s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee.Touch_of_Fear
powers.display_help: The Netherworld is one scary place, and with but a touch, you can give your enemy a glimpse into this dark world. This will cause them to helplessly tremble in Fear. Foes in this state of panic have their chance to hit reduced. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 30.00% chance for 1.0 terrorize for 10.43s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee.Siphon_Life
powers.display_help: You tap the power of the Netherworld and create a life transferring conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to yourself. Foes Siphoned in this manner have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Self +HP

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee.Dark_Consumption
powers.display_help: The dark power of the Netherworld allows you to tap the essence of your foe's soul and transfer it to yourself. This will drain the Hit Points of your enemy and add to your Endurance. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee.Soul_Drain
powers.display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long

display_info: 8.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 30s on self
40.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 30s on self

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dark_Melee.Midnight_Grasp
powers.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe, reduce their chance to hit and continuously drain their life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit

display_info: 5 ticks of 4.59 negative energy damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
5 ticks of 2.06 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
